EmailTemplate.subject: It’s Diabetes Awareness Month—are your clients ready?
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Partner essentials FEATURED Treating the whole person is critical to the success of any Diabetes Management program. November is Diabetes Awareness Month. At Teladoc Health, we are passionate about helping people manage this disease. Our Diabetes Management solution offers a cost-effective model to develop healthy lifestyle habits and improve glycemic control. Learn how Graco, a manufacturing company based in Minnesota, implemented Whole-Person Chronic Care Management Solutions, including Diabetes Management, to control costs and create a healthier workforce. “We love the simplification of one platform to address not only diabetes, but other conditions such as hypertension, weight management, diabetes prevention and behavioral health.” RESOURCES Just over 1 in 10 Americans have diabetes,1 including Chad. Hear about his experience with our personalized chronic care solutions.
